page.title: 03Interview with a councillor
page.content: We interviewed a councillor for the conservative party. He likes his job but finds it difficult because he has to earn a living as well as being a councillor. A typical week in his life would entail working directly with the council for three evenings a week and then on Saturday sitting for about two hours listening to people's problems.there are less happy sides of his job also, like discovering how many lonely people there are. He became a councillor to become more involved in local decision making. He put himself forward for the council and the public elected him. He is a councillor for Lower Bredbury and Romiley.He woks long hours,for instance the day before we interviewed him he had worked from 3.00p.m.until 1.15a.m.
